title: The Fairy Thorn
description: The long awaited novel, The Fairy Thorn, is now available. Dorothy Keddington brings mystery and romance together in this timeless story.Small town librarian Lucy Norris longs for romance and adventure, yet her life is a "calendar of sameness"--until the morning she spies a tall ship sailing through Deception Pass. The sighting becomes a catalyst for change and Lucy soon finds herself a key player in a dangerous masquerade and the quest for a legendary lost painting.
author: Dorothy M. Keddington
